# role

**Instance Property**

The role to request.

## Declaration

```swift
var role: UISceneSession.Role { get }
```

## Discussion

If you created the request using [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISceneSessionActivationRequest-swift.struct/init(session:userActivity:options:)], this property reflects the role of the `session`.

## Managing request details

- **options**: Activation request options to further customize the request.
- **session**: The specific scene session to activate.
- **userActivity**: A user activity to send to the newly activated scene.
